circumstances: While completing a regional executive flight, the pilot encountered technical problems en route and elected to make an emergency landing. While flying over mountainous terrain, he attempted a wheels-up landing on a hillside when the airplane crashed. The burned wreckage was found a day later and the pilote, sole on board, was killed.
probable_cause: Improper operation of powerplant on part of the pilot. Conditions conducive to carburetor/induction systems icing.
